list.title: Discord Access
list.description: Get access to MrRoflWaffles exclusive Discord Channel. You will gain access to secret channels and receive a special Discord role.

list.title: Signed T-Shirt
list.description: Get your new favorite Tee! A personally signed T-Shirt shipped right to your doorstep.

list.title: Legendary Collectable
list.description: This extremely rare MrRoflWaffles moment NFT will only ever exist 5 times. Get your hands on that legendary gameplay moment!

list.title: Exclusive Content
list.description: Access to never released behind the scenes content, special tutorials, and gameplay secrets.

list.title: Get a Shoutout
list.description: Get a 30 second custom video from MrRoflWaffles. Surprise your friends or treat yourself!

list.title: Special Surfshark Discount
list.description: Receive an extra 30% off your 1 year Surfshark subscription. Only redeemable once per account.
